table.title: Most Active Sites by Uploads
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 Event=5 | lookup SPSite Id as SiteId OUTPUTNEW Url | top FarmId,Url | eval percent=round(percent,2)

table.title: Most Active Sites by Downloads
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 Event=3 | lookup SPSite Id as SiteId OUTPUTNEW Url | top FarmId,Url | eval percent=round(percent,2)

table.title: Dormant Sites (No Activity in Last 7 days)
table.searchString: | inputlookup SPSite | table Id,Url | rename Id as SiteId | join type=outer [ search eventtype=mssharepoint-audit Event<14 | stats count by SiteId ] | where isnull(count) | table SiteId,Url

table.title: Read-Only Sites (No Uploads in Last 7 days)
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit Event<14 | eval T=if(Event==1 OR Event==3,"read","write") | chart count by SiteId,T | where write==0 AND read>0 | lookup SPSite Id as SiteId OUTPUT Url | table SiteId,Url

table.title: Largest Sites by Database Size
table.searchString: | inputlookup SPSite | stats max(Storage) as Storage by Id,Url | sort - Storage | eval StorageMB=round(Storage/(1024*1024),2) | table Id,Url,StorageMB | rename StorageMB as "Size (MB)"

table.title: Largest Sites by List Count
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-inventory Type="List" | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT SiteId | stats dc(Id) as Lists by SiteId | lookup SPSite Id as SiteId OUTPUT Url | table SiteId,Url,Lists | sort - Lists

table.title: Largest Sites as Percentage of Quota
table.searchString: | inputlookup SPSite | search StorageMaximumLevel!=0 | eval QuotaUsed = round((Storage / StorageMaximumLevel) * 100),2) | table Url,QuotaUsed | sort - QuotaUsed | rename QuotaUsed as "Quota Used (%age)"

table.title: Sites with Quota Issues
table.searchString: | inputlookup SPSite | where StorageMaximumLevel==0 OR Storage>StorageWarningLevel | eval msg=case(StorageMaximumLevel==0,"No Quota Set",Storage>StorageWarningLevel,"Storage Approaching Quota") | table Url,Storage,msg | sort - Storage | rename Storage as "Disk Usage",msg as "Quota Issue"
